entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.4°C

Visibility: 4.8 km

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023
